effect.scarlet-violet: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.the-teal-mask: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
